name: CoreExpAudioLavalinkUpdates
install_msg: Thanks for trying out the Lavalink updates experiment for Core Audio cog. You can load the experiment with `[p]load core_exp_audio_ll_updates` and then see the available commands with `[p]help CoreExpAudioLavalinkUpdates`.
short: Enable Audio's managed Lavalink server to be updated independently of Red's release schedule.
description: Enable Audio's managed Lavalink server to be updated independently of Red's release schedule.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
author: Cog Creators
